Bitcoin Aussie System Review 2022: Is It A Scam?

Bitcoin Aussie System is a cryptocurrency trading platform that attempts to help newbies in the industry earn money by trading cryptocurrencies. The trading platform is a sophisticated tool machine that quickly combines the trading process. Because of its ease of use and navigation, this trading Bitcoin Aussie System is one of the finest in the […]

Bitcoin Aussie System is a cryptocurrency trading platform that attempts to help newbies in the industry earn money by trading cryptocurrencies.

The trading platform is a sophisticated tool machine that quickly combines the trading process. Because of its ease of use and navigation, this trading Bitcoin Aussie System is one of the finest in the cryptocurrency industry.

According to customer comments, the platform looks to be well-designed to make big gains for its users using high-frequency trading tactics on a daily basis. The automatic trading technique has enabled the great majority of its customers, including those who began with a little investment, to become millionaires.

It is an excellent website for anyone looking to make money and achieve financial independence.

The claims made by the Bitcoin Aussie System will be investigated in this study. Investors will have enough information to make an educated decision about whether or not to participate.

Our Verdict

Bitcoin Aussie System is a genuine robot, not a hoax. Furthermore, Bitcoin Aussie System has a 99% success record, which indicates that nearly 8 out of 10 transactions result in profit. When compared to other auto trading robots on the market, the Bitcoin Aussie System is suitable for both novice and expert traders. The trader can make money with a $250 minimum commitment and without investing a large sum of money. A word of investment advice: rather than putting their whole life savings in trading, a trader should only invest what they can afford to lose.

Bitcoin Aussie System Overview Robot Name: Bitcoin Aussie System Robot Type: Crypto Trading Robot Minimum Deposit: $250 Is It a Scam or Legit? Legit Claimed Win Rate: 84% Trading Fees: None Account Fees: None Deposit/Withdrawal Fees: None Software cost: Free Withdrawal Timeframe: 24 hours #⃣ Number of Cryptocurrencies Supported: 50 Supported Cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, LTC, XRP Supported Fiats: USD, EUR, GBP Leverage: 5000:1 Social Trading: Yes Copy Trading: Yes Native Mobile App: No Free Demo Account: Yes Customer Support: Live Chat Verification required: Introductory Phone Call / KYC $250 Minimum Deposit 9.4/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Bitcoin Aussie System Pros and Cons Pros

Suitable for all types of traders

No experience is needed

Trades are executed very quickly

It supports multiple currencies

No hidden fees

Cons

No mobile application

It does not eliminate market risk

Is Bitcoin Aussie System a Scam?

The firm is authentic, according to the statements and testimony of consumers on the Bitcoin Aussie website. It operates on live markets and lets you to withdraw your profits, meaning that you may profit from the programme. Understand the hazards of cryptocurrency trading and accept that there is no sure method to earn from it. That is simply not true.

Many people have accused Bitcoin Aussie System of using dubious marketing techniques to advertise their goods. Our examination finds that the marketing was subpar, but their claims of earning and withdrawing money are true.

What Is Bitcoin Aussie System?

Bitcoin Aussie System is an investment crypto trading platform based on Bitcoin value fluctuations. Furthermore, this service claims to provide excellent returns for anyone that trade on its platform.

Bitcoin Aussie System claims to assist its customers in earning a passive income online. This means that the trader does not need any special skills to utilise this platform, nor do they need to abandon their normal work to use it.

This robot supposedly promises to speculate on cryptocurrency values. Furthermore, the bot employs a number of trading tactics that it says may generate profits in both rising and sliding market trends. As a result, the trader’s performance with this robot is heavily influenced by volatility rather than market direction.

Due Diligence requires traders to remember that the Bitcoin Aussie System is not a financial institution and so does not accept deposits. When funds are placed into a user’s account, they are handled by a partner broker. Brokers are primarily responsible for arranging deals.

According to our Bitcoin Aussie System review, the partner brokers are highly regulated. Having a registered broker gives traders peace of mind that their money will be secure even if the broker becomes bankrupt.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.4/10 Excellent Rating Create Account How Does Bitcoin Aussie System Work?

Bitcoin Aussie System is a top automated trading programme that executes trading methods employed by the world’s greatest cryptocurrency traders automatically. These trading methods are implemented as algorithms in the trader’s account.

According to our Bitcoin Aussie System review, this trading system is driven by artificial intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing (NLP). As a consequence, this bot claims to be able to learn from data and enhance its accuracy as needed.

This robot also claims to be able to interpret human language and trade news. Scanning the market cap for data, trading announcements, and profiting on this is what trading news entails. The Bitcoin Aussie System can distinguish between legitimate and fraudulent news sources, including tweets. Furthermore, this robot promises to be able to outperform the markets by analysing millions of sources in a fraction of a second.

According to our Bitcoin Aussie System evaluations, this system includes chart analysis technologies. Needless to say, this bot promises to be able to examine hundreds of charts in a nanosecond, as well as detect and execute tradable patterns. It claims to have the best accuracy and success rate, implying that this robot makes winning trades in 90% of its deals.

One of the most crucial aspects is that the brokers available on this platform provide leverage of 1:1000. This means that the transactions completed by this robot are multiplied 1000 times. As a result, a trader who deposits a minimum of $250 can conduct deals worth up to $250,000. Furthermore, keep in mind that larger leverage outcomes might result in big losses.

Key Features of Bitcoin Aussie System Trading Platforms Auto Trade Function

The Auto Trade Feature enables you to trade without having to worry about market analysis and forecasts. This feature function’s purpose is to make trading entertaining and simple for its consumers. Because of its adaptability, it may be used for any form of trade.

This function was included by the developer to help traders who are having problems producing consistent gains in the market. It helps traders to overcome trading limits while also providing excellent returns on investment on a regular basis. This strong feature is critical to the success of all traders.

This tool allows inexperienced traders to benefit from the bitcoin markets on a regular basis while also learning about the industry. Overburdened investors may rely on this fantastic technology to review, scan, and execute deals on their behalf. Instead of interfering with their regular routines, they may benefit passively and consistently.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.4/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Payouts

A $250 investment yields a daily profit of $200 using the Bitcoin Aussie System, while a $500 deposit generates a daily profit of $$350. Furthermore, prior users have proven that the trading robot’s large profits have turned several people become millionaires. The predicted payoff, on the other hand, is proportionate to the magnitude of the deposit. Your knowledge and skill in the bitcoin industry will also influence your reward.

Verification System

After registering, you must go through the verification process. A representative will call you to confirm the submission of the document. He will advise you on the documentation that you must prepare before you may simulate a withdrawal request. At some point, documentation that will serve as evidence of residency and payment will be required.

Deposits and Withdrawals

The Bitcoin Aussie System deposit method is simple and does not require any complicated procedures. Your account is credited practically instantaneously by the system. It may take a little longer in some cases, but never more than 24 hours.

The Bitcoin Aussie System accepts withdrawal requests at any moment and on a regular basis. The system must validate a withdrawal request before sending it to the payment department. Its attraction is enhanced by the fact that treatment simply takes a few minutes and is completely painless. A notification is given to you after the transaction has been completed by email and a message in your account. It is possible that this operation will take up to 12 hours to complete. If you did not get your money within 24 hours of purchase, it is possible that your payment source is experiencing issues.

Costs/Fees

There are no costs connected with any platform transactions, according to their website. There are no fees for using the site or creating an account. The money in your account is yours to keep and remove whenever you choose. Furthermore, the site takes no deductions from successful deals.

How to Use Bitcoin Aussie System – Step-by-Step Guide Step 1: Open an account

The registration process begins with completing the form for a new account at the top of this page. Traders must register with their contact information, which includes their name, email address, and phone number.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.4/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Step 2: Verify your Account

Before proceeding, users may be requested via message to validate their phone number and email address. You must confirm the sent email by clicking on the link embedded in the message. Phone verification, on the other hand, is validated by entering the SMS verification code supplied to your registered phone number. When a trader registers with Bitcoin Aussie System, their jurisdiction is immediately established.

Step 3: Make a Deposit

After you input your registration information, the web page goes to a trading platform. In this instance, the system will direct you to a broker in your region. When registering for a trading platform account, you can submit extra information such as your address and birthday. If you enter your phone number, a customer service person will contact you after you complete your form to walk you through the activation procedure, which needs a minimum deposit of $250. There are several deposit options available, including online currencies such as Skrill, PayPal, Web Money, Bitcoin, and others.

Step 4: Monitor Trading Bot

Users may experiment with a Bitcoin Aussie System sample account before engaging in actual trading to learn how the market works. Because it is a virtual account, no emotion is involved. Customers can use a pre-funded demo account with $25,000 virtual money to handle the trading platform. You may easily put the system through its paces without risking any money. It is also a fantastic chance to practise risk management tactics like as stop-loss and take-profit orders.

Because every move is automated, your broker will be able to monitor transaction executions in real time. If you decide to discontinue automated trading, bear in mind that you retain ultimate control over your earnings. Deposits made to a specified bank account or your deposit card/wallet are processed within 24 hours. Bitcoin Aussie System requires a minimum investment of $250 and a maximum amount of $30,000. Credit card transactions are limited to a maximum deposit of $2,000 per transaction due to tight anti-money laundering restrictions implemented by credit card issuers. After you have completed the registration procedure, an account manager will contact you to assist you in getting started with trading. When you have accumulated sufficient expertise with the practise account, you can begin trading with real money. Always begin with a tiny investment and build your confidence as your account grows. Trading is dangerous. Don’t put all of your money on the line.

Bitcoin Aussie System vs other Trading Robots

The minimal first investment is $250. (compared to other platforms with higher deposit requirements)

Easy KYC procedure (compared to other platforms with massive amounts of information required).

Can you make money with Bitcoin Aussie System?

The Bitcoin Aussie System provides consumers with several chances, including big profits on investment. There is no reason not to aspire for such or even larger returns because this trading robot assures customers make big profits on tiny deposits. With a $250 minimum stake, trading with Bitcoin Aussie System boosts your possibilities of making $200 every day.

New traders must learn to manage their greed. Regardless matter how profitable the robot is, traders should avoid trading more than the specified amount of lots. Making so much money through trading was previously inconceivable for a bot, thus the robot’s performance is simply astonishing.

There are various things to consider when determining a system’s profitability. When it comes to making money or losing money, market volatility is a big factor. Huge volatility is mostly influenced by global economic news. As a trader, you need be familiar with market news in order to forecast where the market is headed.

Depending on the user lot size, the Bitcoin Aussie System will generate a significant profit or loss. Traders should establish trading settings that are appropriate for the magnitude of their investment.

Trading decisions will always include some risk. If the market direction is negative, investors should contemplate the chance of losing money. Risk management is critical for success in the bitcoin sector.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.4/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Tips for new traders 1. Do not invest all of your money.

If you are a beginner trader, we recommend starting with a $250 deposit and progressively increasing your investment as you gain experience. Once you’ve settled on a method for saving and developing your passive income, your objective should be to thoroughly understand how everything works and maximise the value of your deposit. You may use this approach to increase a trader’s profits if their investment matures. Starting with a little amount gives you more time to study the trading technique before risking huge quantities of money. You should, however, only trade with money that you are willing to lose.

2. Take your earnings

You should receive half of the revenues. You will always have enough of cash on hand. Bitcoin Aussie System claims to have developed smart algorithms that allow it to earn from bitcoin trading indefinitely. By using this approach, traders may preserve their cash and lower their chance of incurring a major loss. This technique safeguards your investments while raising earnings.

3. Determine which currency/crypto combos are lucrative.

The internet is now awash with information regarding automatic trading robots. Registered users may access Bitcoin Aussie System demo and live trading tools. Traders can examine the market for signs of predicted behaviour. Before engaging in any transactions, traders should become acquainted with the trading strategies that are employed in order to optimise earnings and have a more pleasurable trading experience.

4. Demo Account

Before engaging in actual trading, it is a good idea to familiarise yourself with the interface by practising on a demo account. Using a demo account boosts the possibilities of a trader’s success. A great amount of time and effort is being put into building the Bitcoin Aussie System from the ground up in order to fully harness its possibilities. Traders who are confident in putting in a modest deposit and beginning live trading are urged to do so.

FAQs Is Bitcoin Aussie System a con?

Because of its large profit margins in short intervals, it is one of the most sought-after bots in the automated trading platform business. It turned out to be one of the most successful trading robots for earning large returns on investment. How does Bitcoin Aussie System work?

Bitcoin Aussie System searches the market for the most profitable signals to include into trading choices, and then executes trades based on the information gained. Cryptocurrency traders developed algorithms and then had them deployed as part of their trading strategy by the platform. Because of the programmed qualities to execute when particular criteria are satisfied, the Bitcoin Aussie System may enter and exit trades at fast rates. The Bitcoin Aussie System runs user-defined parameters and allows transactions with monies from the user’s account. Because of its straightforward design and aesthetic attractiveness, even untrained users will have no problem navigating the interface.

Quantum Trading Review 2022: Is It A Scam?

The cryptocurrency industry has grown in popularity in recent years. One reason for this is the increased ease with which traders may profit; bitcoin trading bots play an important part in this. One of the most popular crypto trading bots on the market today is reported to be Quantum AI. The programme claims to make […]

The cryptocurrency industry has grown in popularity in recent years. One reason for this is the increased ease with which traders may profit; bitcoin trading bots play an important part in this. One of the most popular crypto trading bots on the market today is reported to be Quantum AI. The programme claims to make trading more accessible and to provide traders with a variety of incentives.

Before you begin utilising this bot, you should read a Quantum AI trading review to learn more about it. This review includes everything you need to know about Quantum AI, including how it works, how much it costs, and much more.

Our Verdict

Quantum Trading is one of the most dependable and profitable automatic trading softwares on our list. We had a good experience with Quantum Trading. We verify and certify that this platform contains all of the functionality required to create an exceptional user experience. Quantum Trading gives novice investors more options for making money in the cryptocurrency markets. Quantum Trading, in contrast to many other trading bots, is more transparent, safe, and straightforward.

Quantum Trading Overview Robot Name: Quantum Trading Robot Type: Crypto Trading Robot Minimum Deposit: $250 Is It a Scam or Legit? Legit Claimed Win Rate: 86% Trading Fees: None Account Fees: None Deposit/Withdrawal Fees: None Software cost: Free Withdrawal Timeframe: 24 hours #⃣ Number of Cryptocurrencies Supported: 50 Supported Cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, LTC, XRP Supported Fiats: USD, EUR, GBP Leverage: 5000:1 Social Trading: Yes Copy Trading: Yes Native Mobile App: No Free Demo Account: Yes Customer Support: Live Chat Verification required: Introductory Phone Call / KYC $250 Minimum Deposit 9.6/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Quantum Trading Pros and Cons Pros

No fees charged

Quantum AI’s developers claim a 90% success rate

Trading bot allows you to take short and long positions

Cons

No Quantum AI trading app on mobile

We could not verify the claims of the providers

Is Quantum Trading a Scam?

As is generally known, every investment and trading tool has some level of risk. Quantum Trading is no different. We always urge consumers to perform their own research before investing due to the apparent inherent trading risks. Before you can begin investing in financial markets, you must first understand the market and its characteristics.

During our testing, we discovered no problems or issues with Quantum Trading. In our opinion, the application is credible, efficient, and trustworthy. The account signup procedure is simple and quick. You may also utilise the demo account functionality to evaluate the trading platform and its features before becoming real. To administer trading accounts, the site utilises registered brokers and account managers.

What Is Quantum Trading?

The Quantum AI robot is a computerised trading system that assists bitcoin traders in capitalising on market opportunities. The bot proposes leveraging the trading load to optimise your earnings by automating your trades and aiding you in choosing the optimum entry and exit positions.

According to reports, quantum AI was developed by a group of skilled traders and mathematicians who aim to enable as many traders as possible earn from the market. We sought to discover more about the founders for our Quantum AI evaluation but were unable.

Although many crypto firms operate without the public awareness of their owners and developers, the absence of information about the founders might be a warning sign.

Quantum AI’s purpose is to use the trading load and aid you in generating more money. To do this, the bot uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to analyse the market and hunt for trends. It then finds the optimal entry and exit points in trading and focuses on increasing your profits.

The designers of Quantum AI say that the bot can help traders make lucrative trades 90% of the time. We were unable to confirm this from additional Quantum AI studies, thus we suggest caution while trading. You don’t want to lose money in the unpredictable bitcoin market.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.6/10 Excellent Rating Create Account How Does Quantum Trading Work?

Quantium AI demonstrates its functionality by supporting you in the trading of contracts for difference (CFDs). CFDs on bitcoin are derivatives that provide you the right to buy or sell a cryptocurrency at a certain price and time. They allow you to trade bitcoin long or short and are essential to the Quantum AI robot’s functionality.

You should be warned, however, that CFD trading may be dangerous. The Quantum AI website emphasises that investors must trade these assets with utmost caution since they are exceedingly risky.

To trade successfully, the Quantum AI Bitcoin robot utilises artificial intelligence and machine learning. The bot, according to the bot, uses these two concepts to parse the market in real-time and analyse trends. After that, the robot looks for the optimal entry and exit sites.

Customers, according to the bot, may programme the trading bot to match their own demands. This is advised since it helps you to get control of your position and reduce possible loss.

According to the bot, it works with licenced brokers that handle transaction execution and management. These brokers play an important part in how Quantum AI works since they help the bot ensure your profitability. We couldn’t find much information on them, however the Quantum AI creators claim that they are approved and regulated.

Key Features of Quantum Trading Trading Platforms Excellent Trading System

In today’s market, several bitcoin trading algorithms seek to uncover benefits. In the end, even a tiny advantage over a competitor may be sufficient. The self-proclaimed exceptional artificial intelligence-based trading system of Quantum AI is its competitive edge.

Quantum AI, as an automated trading bot, focuses on market analysis and spotting top trends to help you make money. According to its developers, it has a 90% success rate. We were unable to corroborate this, and we recommend that you exercise care while communicating with this bot.

The platform should be used by both novice and experienced traders, and strong trade management procedures are essential to defend against market downturns. The bitcoin market is incredibly unpredictable, and you don’t want your transaction to fall through the cracks.

Signup and verification are completed quickly.

Many cryptocurrency services now need anti-money laundering (AML) and know-your-customer (KYC) checks before you may use them. These procedures are sometimes lengthy and time-consuming. Quantum AI, on the other hand, does not require all of this.

The bot confirms that you may join up and begin using the service in minutes. Simply provide your name, email address, and phone number to get started.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.6/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Support for Multiple Currencies

We observed that the bot can trade in three currencies during our Quantum AI research: Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), and Bitcoin Cash (BCH)

This adaptability enables investors to diversify their portfolios and open many positions. It isn’t the most adaptable bot, but Quantum AI claims to provide adequate versatility.

While investing, keep in mind to protect yourself from market instability. Only open positions if you are certain of your plan.

Affordably priced trading tool

Several Quantum AI reviews have emphasised the platform’s cheap cost. They claim that there are no costs associated with the robot and that all you have to pay is 0.01% of your overall revenues. If this is right, the Quantum AI robot will be one of the least expensive crypto trading bots on the market.

How to Use Quantum Trading – Step-by-Step Guide

It is simple to open a trading account with Quantum Trading. We went through the process ourselves, and you’ll be relieved to know that enrolling up is completely free. Right now, we’ll go over the steps to establish a trading account with you.

Step 1: Open an account

The signup process is straightforward, and it doesn’t get any easier than this. All you have to do is complete the online form with your basic information and submit it. As soon as these credentials are authenticated, one of the specialised account managers will contact you.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.6/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Step 2: Make a Deposit

Making a deposit is a straightforward, secure, and quick procedure. Quantum Trading will require a €250 minimum investment before real trading can commence. This small contribution will be your first investing money. All transactions will be conducted over the internet. You don’t have to worry about your information being stolen or used for fraud or theft since the Quantum Trading platform is safeguarded by SSL encryption.

Step 3: Monitor Trading Bot

We were pleasantly delighted by the Quantum Trading demo account option. This is an excellent option for beginners since it allows them to trade in practise mode before participating in live sessions. The best aspect is that no actual money is required for demo trading. It’s only a matter of putting forth the effort.

When you’ve spent enough time with the demo account and are familiar with the platform’s various features, you may begin engaging in live trading. We urge that all consumers trade in demo mode before engaging in live sessions after examining the demo account’s capabilities. It is not only excellent practise, but it also provides you with the experience you will need to succeed in trading. Your personal account manager will help you decide on your trading criteria.

Quantum Trading vs other Trading Robots

The minimal first investment is $250. (compared to other platforms with higher deposit requirements)

Simple KYC process (compared to other platforms with massive amounts of information required).

Can you make money with Quantum Trading?

We extensively evaluate the most popular trading bots, as previously indicated. Our tests revealed that getting started with Quantum Trading is simple and uncomplicated after you’ve figured out how to browse the site. This is fantastic news, especially for rookie traders who are unfamiliar with trading software.

All you need to get started is a laptop or desktop computer, tablet, or smartphone, as well as an internet connection that is safe. Many internet users choose to manage their accounts from their smartphones. This means they can keep an eye on their trading operations from anywhere on the earth. Before any trading can begin, an upfront deposit is necessary. The good news is that the deposit is reasonably priced.

To get started, a new user simply needs €250. This contribution is then used as seed capital. Quantum Trading charges no registration or membership fees. This is all that a new user requires to get started. If there are any problems, the account managers and customer care staff reply quickly.

Tips for new traders

We sought to ensure that the Quantum Trading platform will provide you with profitable chances. One of our primary objectives in developing these trading methods is to guarantee that they deliver true value to clients and are not a scam or a fraud. Many users have claimed substantial profits and commended the trading system’s ease of use.

We examined Quantum Trading’s transaction procedures and discovered that they are as efficient as the official website promises. The cryptocurrency market is famously volatile, which should not be underestimated. You should check your account at least 30 minutes every day to stay up to date on any new updates.

Put in only the minimal necessities.

To get started, Quantum Trading requires a €250 minimum commitment. We highly encourage you to make your deposit as low as possible. You may always add more money to your account once you start earning a steady income.

Reinvest your earnings

It is usually a good idea to reinvest. This way, you’ll have a higher chance of making more money. You do not have to reinvest all of your money right away; it is preferable to begin with a little amount.

Seek assistance from experienced investors.

Both Quantum Trading’s brokers and customer service representatives have extensive expertise. If you are unsure, you can seek advice from these experts.

Conduct your research

It is typically a good idea to take measured risks. Make sure you’ve done your study and have all of the information you’ll need to make sound trading decisions.

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.6/10 Excellent Rating Create Account Has Quantum Trading Been Endorsed by Celebrities? Dragons Den – Peter Jones, Deborah Meaden

Dragons Den is a well-known British show that matches business tycoon fantasies against a panel of experienced entrepreneurs. The goal is to convince them to invest in your project. Any notion accepted by the panel may quickly become a worldwide phenomenon, demonstrating that Quantum Trading can discover trading opportunities and develop profitable trading indicators for independent traders. We investigated into if there was a connection between Quantum Trading and the programme, but we couldn’t find any evidence to back up this allegation.

Elon Musk

Elon Musk is a self-made millionaire who created SpaceX, Tesla Motors, and Solar City. He’s also a powerful celebrity with the ability to have a huge impact on any financial market all across the world with a single statement. For example, if he came out in support of Bitcoin, the headlines would be all over the place: “Elon Supports Quantum Trading!” Even after conducting extensive online searches, our crew was unable to locate any proof or hint that this had occurred, or that he had endorsed the trading tools or trading approach of Quantum Trading in any way!

Jeremey Clarkson

Despite rumors that Jeremy Clarkson’s trading careers started as a result of them being consistently successful on Quantum Trading, we could not find any evidence to support the assertion that Jeremy Clarkson had been trading the financial markets through Quantum Trading.

Holly Marie Willoughby

Holly Marie Willoughby, one of the UK’s most well-known and popular TV anchors, is said to have devised a campaign for an undisclosed cryptocurrency trading site that would help kickstart trading careers by helping to determine market direction, especially in the futures market. However, there is no evidence to back up this claim.

Idris Elba

Idris Elba is an award-winning actor, singer, and businessman who invests in equities primarily, however, his trading style also makes him a prime suspect for being an investor in virtually every market including cryptocurrencies. He’s also the star of a new Netflix series called “Luther,” in which he portrays Detective John Luther; but how does Idris feel about investing? Our staff looked for evidence that this individual had anything to do with Quantum Trading but couldn’t uncover any.

Ant McPartlin

According to a recent report, TV personality Ant McPartlin may have invested in Bitcoin via a complete forex trading program. He is said to be an actor as well as the producer/host of one of Britain’s most popular television series, as well as a musician on the side. Is this a real rumour? We don’t know for sure yet, but considering his interests outside of Hollywood, it wouldn’t be surprising if such were the case—he might very well find value in investing early in such revolutionary technologies before any big failures are seen or experienced by those who do invest later down the line.

Nicole Kidman

Nicole Kidman, the Oscar-winning actress known for her appearances in films such as Moulin Rouge!, has recently been the subject of speculations around a prospective investment in Quantum Trading. Our staff was unable to locate any proof that she is actively connected with this project, but we are not ruling anything out just yet!

Trevor Noah

The Daily Show presenter Trevor Noah is alleged to be affiliated with Quantum Trading. Many people believe he became wealthy due of his engagement with bitcoin and his broader trading approach, but it is really because of his comic experience and work on The Daily Show, for which he was paid far more than other comedians. As far as we know, there is no indication that Trevor made any investments or engaged in speculative trading on Quantum Trading, thus there isn’t much further to say about him utilising Quantum Trading!

Gordon Ramsey

Gordon Ramsay, the worldwide culinary and entertainment king, is a big success. For the past decade or so, his work as an author and chef on television series such as Hell’s Kitchen has earned him international acclaim. However, considering his experience in these areas and his own trading journey, there are suspicions that he may be supporting Quantum Trading; however, no substantial evidence of this assertion has been produced, so it remains just that: a rumour.

Is It Possible to Withdraw Earnings?

We discovered that an investor’s gains can be withdrawn at any moment. The procedure goes off without a hitch. Simply fill out the withdrawal form, and it will be executed within 24 hours. Responses from other trading platforms may take a week or two.

What are the fees for Quantum Trading?

Fees are one of the most crucial considerations while performing the Quantum AI test. We reviewed various platform evaluations and discovered the following cost structure:

As seen in the table above, Quantum AI charges a 0.01% fee on completed transactions. Many other bots charge fees for account inactivity and even transactions, so this is preferable.

The price structure also shows that you pay the bot’s developers only when you generate money. By charging a lower commission than most other trading bots, Quantum AI proves its affordability.

Account Opening Fee: None

Commissions: 0.01%

Inactivity Fee: None

Account Maintenance Fee: None

Transaction Charges: None

$250 Minimum Deposit 9.6/10 Excellent Rating Create Account FAQs Is my data safe with Quantum Trading?

According to the website, Quantum Trading employs 256-bit SSL encryption. The offered SSL Certification is a tried and verified internet security standard for encrypting private data on any given website.

What is the cost of opening a new account?

There is no fee to establish a new Quantum Trading account. It is completely free to use. There are no additional or hidden fees.

Is it legal to withdraw Cryptos from the trading app after making a profit?

Unfortunately, this is not possible. The trading programme converts your winnings to local currency and deposits them into the bank account connected with your Quantum Trading account. This procedure assures that your profits are legal and comply with regulatory requirements.

What are some other reliable cryptocurrency trading platforms?

There are several cryptocurrency trading sites. Other trustworthy cryptocurrency trading platforms include Bitcoin Code, Bitcoin Revolution, and Bitcoin Era. Aside from this, there are several financial asset investing platforms that now incorporate cryptocurrencies in their portfolios. However, we recommend that you conduct market research before making any expenditures and select a platform that best matches your demands.

Is there a cap on how much money I can make?

There appears to be no upper limit to the amount of profit that may be made with Cryptocurrencies. Profit is directly proportional to your investment. We constantly suggest caution while making investments. Because of the market dangers, it is advised to employ just your spare cash. Never invest cash that are required to support your everyday and emergency costs.

Is Quantum Trading a Scam?

To the best of our knowledge, Quantum Trading is a reputable trading platform. It is said to be an award-winning bitcoin trading app. User testimonials on the main website and various partner channels support this claim.

How much time will I be able to spend on this project?

Although the trading method is totally automated, spending the recommended time monitoring your account provides you with an in-depth understanding of the market and current trends. The time you put in will assist you a lot in reducing risks and becoming a more seasoned investor.

Is it prudent to put all of your money into Quantum Trading?

No, as a general guideline, you should never invest money that you need or cannot afford to lose. Making responsible investing is crucial. As a result, you should only invest money that you will not need immediately or in an emergency.

Because the cryptocurrency market is volatile and time-sensitive, it is a high-risk, high-reward investment opportunity. Starting small is a smart idea. Any investment has risks, but the stop-loss provision shields potential investors from large losses.

It is also a good idea to talk about your investing intentions with your personal broker. Their knowledge may assist you in rationalising your investments and getting the most of your available finances.

Oasis Open Projects

OSLC PROMCODE v1.0 Errata 02 approved

Provides errata for the OASIS Standard "OSLC PROMCODE Version 1.0." The post OSLC PROMCODE v1.0 Errata 02 approved appeared first on OASIS Open.

Approved Errata from the OSLC PROMCODE TC

We are pleased to announce that OSLC PROMCODE v1.0 Errata 02 from the OSLC PROMCODE TC is now an Approved Errata.

This document lists errata for the OASIS Standard “OSLC PROMCODE Version 1.0.” As described in the document, there are changes to the published OASIS Standard documents for Part 1: Specification and Part 3: Constraints. Changes have also been made to the two machine-readable “turtle” files (promcode-vocab.ttl and promcode-shapes.ttl). As required by OASIS policy, these are not Material Changes.

OSLC PROMCODE Version 1.0 defines the overall approach to PROMCODE (PROject Management of COntracted DElivery) based on the Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration (OSLC) Core 3.0 [OSLCCore3] Specification.

The documents and related files are available here:

OSLC PROMCODE Version 1.0 Errata 02
Approved Errata
09 December 2022

HTML:
https://docs.oasis-open.org/oslc-promcode/promcode/v1.0/errata02/os/promcode-v1.0-errata02-os.html (Authoritative)
PDF:
https://docs.oasis-open.org/oslc-promcode/promcode/v1.0/errata02/os/promcode-v1.0-errata02-os.pdf

Machine-readable files
– Vocabulary terms: https://docs.oasis-open.org/oslc-promcode/promcode/v1.0/errata02/os/promcode-vocab.ttl
– Constraints: https://docs.oasis-open.org/oslc-promcode/promcode/v1.0/errata02/os/promcode-shapes.ttl

For your convenience, OASIS provides a complete package of the specification document and any related files in ZIP distribution files. You can download the ZIP file at:
https://docs.oasis-open.org/oslc-promcode/promcode/v1.0/errata02/os/promcode-v1.0-errata02-os.zip

Members of the OSLC PROMCODE TC approved Errata 02 by Full Majority Vote. The specification had been released for public review as required by the TC Process [2]. The vote to approve as Approved Errata passed [3], and the document is now available online in the OASIS Library as referenced above.

Our congratulations to the TC on achieving this milestone and our thanks to the reviewers who provided feedback on the specification drafts to help improve the quality of the work.

Additional information about the specification and the OSLC PROMCODE TC can be found at the TC’s public home page:
https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/oslc-promcode/

========== Additional references:

[1] OASIS OSLC Lifecycle Integration for Project Management of Contracted Delivery (OSLC PROMCODE) TC
https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/oslc-promcode/

[2] Public review:
* 15-day public review began 23 November 2022
Announcement email: https://lists.oasis-open.org/archives/oslc-promcode/202211/msg00004.html
https://docs.oasis-open.org/oslc-promcode/promcode/v1.0/errata02/csd01/promcode-v1.0-errata02-csd01-public-review-metadata.html

[3] Meeting minutes:
https://wiki.oasis-open.org/oslc-promcode/telecon%20December%209%2C%202022

The post OSLC PROMCODE v1.0 Errata 02 approved appeared first on OASIS Open.

14:34 • 2 hours ago

Energy Web

Energy Web joins Hyperledger Foundation to Accelerate Web 3 Interoperability

By joining Hyperledger Foundation, Energy Web aims to expand its existing open source community and directly contribute to ongoing open source projects hosted by the Linux Foundation. Zug, Switzerland, 14 December 2022— Energy Web, a non-profit building open-source technology solutions for energy systems, has today joined Hyperledger Foundation, a project of the Linux Foundation.. By joining Hype
By joining Hyperledger Foundation, Energy Web aims to expand its existing open source community and directly contribute to ongoing open source projects hosted by the Linux Foundation.

Zug, Switzerland, 14 December 2022— Energy Web, a non-profit building open-source technology solutions for energy systems, has today joined Hyperledger Foundation, a project of the Linux Foundation.. By joining Hyperledger Foundation, Energy Web aims to expand its existing open source community and directly contribute to ongoing open source projects hosted by the Linux Foundation.

Specifically, Energy Web will contribute towards enterprise interoperability of Web 3 solutions via Hyperledger FireFly. Interoperability between different blockchains and identity solutions has emerged as a top priority for Energy Web as the organisation begins constructing solutions that leverage multiple technologies from different enterprise and Web 3 ecosystems. FireFly, and more generally collaboration with the Hyperledger community, represents a unique opportunity for Energy Web’s technology to be more tightly coupled with other innovations taking place in the Web 3 space.

“Our team has been monitoring the growth of Hyperledger Foundation and, in particular, HyperledgerFireFly for some time,” said Mani Hagh Sefat, Chief Technology Officer of Energy Web Foundation. “We couldn’t be more excited to finally jump into the initiative and contribute directly to it as our stack evolves to better integrate with multiple legacy and Web 3 technologies.”
“Interoperability is critical to maximizing the value of Web3 and other blockchain and related applications,” said Daniela Barbosa, Executive Director, Hyperledger Foundation, and General Manager Blockchain and Identity at the Linux Foundation. “With its open source tech stack, Energy Web is already helping to advance industry-wide collaboration and support a diverse and decentralized ecosystem. We welcome Energy Web as a member and contributor and look forward to the innovation and effort they will bring to our community, technologies and the next wave of Hyperledger-powered applications.”

Energy Web recently announced its intention to launch a new blockchain, Energy Web X, also aimed at increasing interoperability of Web 3 identity solutions.

About Energy WebEnergy Web is a global non-profit accelerating the clean energy transition by developing open-source technology solutions for energy systems. Our enterprise-grade solutions improve coordination across complex energy markets, unlocking the full potential of clean, distributed energy resources for businesses, grid operators, and customers. Our solutions for enterprise asset management, data exchange, and Green Proofs, our tool for registering and tracking low-carbon products, are underpinned by the Energy Web Chain, the world’s first public blockchain tailored to the energy sector. The Energy Web ecosystem comprises leading utilities, renewable energy developers, grid operators, corporate energy buyers, automotive, IoT, telecommunications leaders, and more. More information on Energy Web can be found at www.energyweb.org or follow us on Twitter @EnergyWebX

Energy Web joins Hyperledger Foundation to Accelerate Web 3 Interoperability was originally published in Energy Web on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

13:04 • 4 hours ago

bitnation

Bitcoin Almost Touches $18k, Altcoins Bullish, TON Jumps 21%: Market Report

Bitcoin (BTC) was able to retain $17k and made a move towards $18k while Ether is finally back above $1,300.
Bitcoin (BTC) was able to retain $17k and made a move towards $18k while Ether is finally back above $1,300. The worst performing tokens are GMX (GMX), Stacks (STX), ApeCoin (APE), and Bitcoin SV (BSV). The best performing cryptocurrencies are Toncoin (TON), GMX (GMX), Near Protocol (NEAR), OKB (OKB), and Lido DAO (LIDO). The total crypto market liquidation in the last 24 hours amounts to $97.95 million of which BTC makes up around $43.99 million.

The crypto market turned significantly bullish on Wednesday as trading volumes also surged. Interestingly, the accumulation of the leading cryptocurrency, Bitcoin (BTC), is also on the rise as gradually more investors are buying the current dip. However, it is also crucial to note that the regulatory uncertainty could be a reason why a global adoption of cryptocurrencies is not currently being witnessed.

On December 14, the world’s biggest cryptocurrency was able to hold above the $17k price level, which means that the retest of the nearest resistance zone is quite likely. As a result, we saw Bitcoin try to break the $18k price region but was unable to do so due to a not very high buying volumes. Additionally, the crypto coin needs to break above $18k and reclaim $20,000 price region to confirm a bullish breakout towards $24k price levels.

,As of 7:20 am ET Wednesday, the price of 1 Bitcoin (BTC) stands at $17,873, up 2.46% in the last 24 hours while in the last seven days, the price has jumped by around 6.34%. This indicates that a bullish phase might be coming close for BTC as gradually, the year end is coming near and a bullish run like 2021’s “Santa Bull Run” can be imagined as well.

The market dominance of Bitcoin stands at 39.34% while the trading of the cryptocurrency has jumped by 11.08% in the last 24 hours which means that the buying pressure in the market is currently higher than the selling pressure. However, BTC is still significantly low (about 74%) from its all-time high of $69k noted in November 2021.

As per the chart below from PricePredictions, Bitcoin is gradually rising on the one hour timeframe which suggests that the price of BTC is picking up pace and this means that a short term bullish outbreak is on the table as well. The 1-hour chart indicates that BTC is actually making higher highs today.

Source: PricePredictions

Next, the indicators from the website shows that almost every indicator is bullish for Bitcoin on all time frame which means that any trades placed in the last 24 hours, would’ve resulted in profit. However, it is crucial to rightly time the market and not be extremely greedy when implementing a trade.

The major indicators like RSI and MACD are bullish as well while a uptrend can be seen on the shorter time frame with the help of the Bollinger Bands. To summarize, the 5 mintue, 15 minute, 30 minute, one hour, two hour and four hour, and 24 hours time frames are bullish for the world’s oldest cryptocurrency, Bitcoin (BTC).

Source: PricePredictions

Additionally, as per the publicly available data, the crypto market’s Fear and Greed Index’s value has risen to 30, after resting at 27 as per our Crypto Market Performance Report for Dec. 13. However, the market sentiment still reads “fear,” which means that the uncertainity in the crypto space prevails and investors are unsure if $18k will be reclaimed.

Furthermore, the market cap of the entire crypto space at the time of publication stands at $872 billion, and this value is up 1.87% in the last 24 hours. Moreover, the number of crypto coins is 22,032, as listed on CoinMarketCap.

On the other hand, it is also crucial to note that the biggest rival of Bitcoin, world’s second-biggest cryptocurrency, the Ether (ETH) token has also performed quite well. Vitalik Buterin’s token is up 2.92% in the last 24 hours and is currently priced at $1,328. The trading volume of the crypto coin has surged by 27.26%, while the market dominance rose to 18.61%.

According to the data from Coinglass, the total crypto market liquidation in the last 24 hours amounted to $97.95 million, of which, Bitcoin made up $43.99 million and Ether made up $30.63 million.

Excluding Bitcoin and Ether, the other top 10 cryptocurrencies in the industry are Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), Cardano (ADA), and Polygon (MATIC).

The other top 10 cryptocurrencies show bullish movements with BNB up 2.08% to $272.99; XRP up 0.99% to $0.3912; DOGE up 1.26% to $0.09114; ADA up 1.20% to $0.3116 and MATIC up 2.42% to $0.9219.

On the other hand, the worst performing tokens in the last 24 hours among the top 100, excluding the top 10, are GMX (GMX), Stacks (STX), ApeCoin (APE), and Bitcoin SV (BSV).

Interestingly, GMX was down 7.37% to $54.63; STX was down 6.17% to $0.2862; APE was down 1.23% to $4.07; and BSV was down 2.12% to $45.98.

Finally, the best performers in the top 100, not considering the top 10 cryptocurrencies are Toncoin (TON), GMX (GMX), Near Protocol (NEAR), OKB (OKB), and Lido DAO (LIDO).

TON was up 21.45% to $2.78; NEAR was up 6.30% to $1.73; OKB was up 6.88% to $22.98; and LIDO was up 8.13% to $1.14.

09:23 • 7 hours ago

GS1

Consumer trust, business efficiency and patient safety start with globally unique and verifiable identification

Consumer trust, business efficiency and patient safety start with globally unique and verifiable identification daniela.duarte… Wed, 12/14/2022 - 08:53 Consumer trust, business efficiency and patient safety start with globally unique and verifiable identification 14 Dece
Consumer trust, business efficiency and patient safety start with globally unique and verifiable identification daniela.duarte… Wed, 12/14/2022 - 08:53 Consumer trust, business efficiency and patient safety start with globally unique and verifiable identification 14 December 2022

For almost 50 years, the foundation of our work has been to provide unique identification through the barcode,  with the GS1 GTIN (the barcode number) and other supply chain standards, ultimately benefitting consumers and patients.

In order to continue on this path, our vision today is to empower the digital transformation of industry. To do that, we must ensure that all GS1 identification keys and links to other sources of data associated with those keys are present in trusted, neutral, authoritative digital registries.

When all physical products are uniquely identified with a barcode number, brand owners and manufacturers can be confident that their items will be represented in the digital world just as they are in the physical world. Industry will see better operational efficiencies, such as reduced time to market and smoother logistics and supply chain processes, as well as better consumer transparency, a reduction in counterfeits and more accurate product information.

The GS1 Registry Platform

In 2019, after in-depth consultations with a large and diverse group of brand owners, manufacturers, retailers, solution providers and other industry representatives, as well as our own GS1 Member Organisations (MOs), we developed a data services strategy and immediately began to work on the GS1 Registry Platform.

The GS1 Registry Platform is a cloud-based repository of Global Company Prefixes (GCPs), GS1 Identification Keys such as Global Trade Item Numbers (GTINs or barcode numbers) and GS1 Global Location Numbers (GLNs), each accompanied by a minimum set of data attributes and links to other sources of data.

Brand owners upload this data via their local GS1 office, and they are ultimately responsible for the information they provide. In addition, a range of structural and completeness checks inside the system ensure that the data added is of the highest possible quality.

No matter how big or how small a company is, no matter whether they have a thousand products or just a few, no matter where they are in the world, the GS1 Registry Platform ensures that their information is available globally.

With our Registry Platform, GS1 provides industry members with a neutral, authoritative and global source of information where they can verify basic data about products. The GS1 Registry Platform is also the foundation for user-centric, easily consumable and simple services, built on global standards that are open and easy to integrate into external systems.

Verified by GS1

Of course, these registries are only meaningful if organisations can access and use the valuable information they contain – and that’s where Verified by GS1 comes in.

Verified by GS1 enables retailers, marketplaces, customs officials, solution providers and others to verify product information and company identity by querying the GS1 Registry Platform. Verified by GS1 answers the question: “Is this the product that I think it is?”.

In March 2022, we launched Verified by GS1 on gs1.org. This freely available tool allows anyone to make up to 30 queries per day. Designed to increase awareness, it helps retailers, marketplaces and brands better understand the benefits as well as visualise how the data is presented.

You can read more about our key projects in the GS1 Annual Report 2021-2022.
 

08:53 • 8 hours ago

bitnation

Wemade Appeals Against Court Order on Delisting of Microsoft-backed WEMIX

Wemade, a gaming company, filed an appeal against a court for rejecting its request to block the delisting of the WEMIX token.
Wemade, a gaming company, filed an appeal against a court for rejecting its request to block the delisting of the WEMIX token. The price of the WEMIX token jumped 1.26% in the last 24 hours and is price at $0.433937 at the time of writing. Wemix (WEMIX) raised $46 million from Microsoft, and asset management firms Kiwoom Securities and Shinhan Asset Management. Wemade claims that the exchanges are abusing their power and did not provide proper guidelines.

Recently, the big five major crypto exchanges in South Korea, one of the fastest-growing crypto hubs in the world, Upbit, Bithumb, Coinone, Korbit, and Gopax, which form the Digital Asset eXchange Alliance (DAXA), decided to delist the WEMIX token, a crypto coin that is backed by tech giant Microsoft. Interestingly, the company behind the token, Wemade, has filed an appeal against a court for its decision of refusal of the company’s request to suspend the delisting of the token from exchanges.

Wemade filed an immediate appeal against the court’s decision on Tuesday and as per the law in South Korea, such an appeal grants a complaint to be filed to a lower court within one week from the decision of the court. Meanwhile, the big five exchanges decided to delist the crypto coin in November and cited misreporting of total token circulation data as the reason for doing so.

On the other hand, Wemade, a gaming company, filed injunctions against all the exchanges for doing so which were dismissed by a Seoul court last week. However, the WEMIX token was finally removed from all the platforms on Dec. 8, and the as a result, the company’s shares and cryptocurrency values plunged, causing losses to the investors as well, who sold their holdings at lower prices.

It is crucial to note that Wemade has stated in its argument that Upbit, Bithumb, Coinone, Korbit, and Gopax have abused their powers and cornered the firm. The gaming company also claims that the exchanges did not provide proper guidelines to crypto firms which is the basis of the DAXA delisting the WEMIX token.

Interestingly, Wemix (WEMIX) had raised $46 million from Microsoft, and asset management firms Kiwoom Securities and Shinhan Asset Management, as per a Nov. 4 announcement and as a result, it attracted investors from different backgrounds.

Meanwhile, Wemade has listed the WEMIX token on GDAC, another local crypto exchange that currently only serves token-to-token transactions while the big five exchanges also provide token-to-fiat on and off-ramps. 

In November, when the exchanges announced the delisting of the crypto coin, WEMIX price plunged as investors hurridly sold off their holdings. However, Wemade announced that it will be burning off $10 million worth of tokens in an attempt to recover the price of the token.

Wemade is a well-known gaming firm created in 2000 and enjoyed success with the help of “The Legend of Mir 2.” The company has recently adopted blockchain into its games and as a result, created play-to-earn MMORPG game MIR4 Global, which had over 1.4 million concurrent users last year.

Additionally, following the announcement of the appeal, the price of the WEMIX token jumped 1.26% in the last 24 hours and is price at $0.433937 at the time of writing.

04:53 • 12 hours ago

Binance Brings “Binance Pay” For US Customers

The world’s biggest crypto exchange, Binance, has opened a new payment method for its customers in the United States. As per a blog post from the leading crypto platform, America-based customers of the exchange can now use the “Pay” feature to send money to other users quite easily, avoiding complex payment methods which take time […]
Binance has debuted “Pay” feature for all its customers in the United States. The feature was launched in Feb 2021 but wasn’t available for US customers. Users can now send money “immediately” using their smartphones. The firm is also working on a web version for the Binance Pay feature. The exchange has also re-opened USDC withdrawals.

The world’s biggest crypto exchange, Binance, has opened a new payment method for its customers in the United States. As per a blog post from the leading crypto platform, America-based customers of the exchange can now use the “Pay” feature to send money to other users quite easily, avoiding complex payment methods which take time for settlements.

As per a Tuesday blog post, Binance Pay will be available to the US customers and CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao said payments is one of the “most obvious use cases for crypto.” It is crucial to note that the Pay feature has been a part of the exchange’s ecosystem since February 2021 and since then, a US release has been pending.

However now, Binance Pay will allow “users to send, request and receive almost 150 different cryptocurrencies from other users, enabling instant, zero-cost crypto transfers.” This seems to be an attempt to increase the trading volume on the crypto exchange amid an increasingly bearish crypto market which has affected the prices of all the crypto coins. The exchange also removed trading fees from Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH) trading pairs to bolster volume on the platform.

“Pay eliminates the complexities of transferring crypto to contacts as users no longer need to enter a complex deposit or withdrawal address, pay gas fees, or wait an unspecified amount of time for transactions to successfully settle,” the company said.

Currently, US-based users can immediately use the Binance Pay feature from their smartphones. However, the company is still working on a web-based feature that could be released in the near future.

Binance Reopens USDC Withdrawals

As reported earlier by Bitnation, the leading crypto exchange had paused withdrawals of Circle’s USDC on the platform which gave rise to a FUD in the crypto community. Many people started withdrawing their money from the exchange which was already facing the consequences of a Reuters report stating that half of the US Department of Justice (DoJ) is aiming to file criminal charges against Binance.

The leading exchange denied the charges while the crypto community stated that this is a co-ordinated media attack. Due to the rumors of a DoJ investigation and potential issues in the Binance proof of reserves report, the platform’s native token, BNB, crashed as well.

However, the USDC withdrawals are back online on Binance as per a blog post late Tuesday. Interestingly, the exchange saw above $1 billion withdrawn from it in just 24 hours owing to fears of another insolvent firm. Although, Changpeng Zhao, the CEO and co-founder of the exchange, stated that this “is a good idea to “stress test withdrawals” on each CEX on a rotating basis.”

We saw some withdrawals today (net $1.14b ish). We have seen this before. Some days we have net withdrawals; some days we have net deposits. Business as usual for us.

I actually think it is a good idea to “stress test withdrawals” on each CEX on a rotating basis.

1/2 https://t.co/uF9lLPDSyS

— CZ Binance (@cz_binance) December 13, 2022

It was also revealed that Binance has over $60 billion in cold wallets which is sufficient to back customers funds in case things go South.

wait binance have 60 billion in cold wallets? dis seems like 420 magnitudes more professional than ftx scrambling in absolute shit defi farms just to meet last few redemptions before they 0'd and ftx barely had a cold wallet so why are ppl scared https://t.co/jnQBNkWnVd pic.twitter.com/o2o4OVDtk4

— CL (@CL207) December 13, 2022

Talking about the USDC withdrawal pause, the executive stated that the channel to swap from PAX/BUSD to USDC requires going through a bank in NY in USD and since the banks were not open, the situation regarding the stablecoin couldn’t be restored.

Tuesday, 13. December 2022

FIDO Alliance

White Paper: FIDO for e-Government Services

The global COVID-19 pandemic closed offices and forced governments to rapidly move services online, if they weren’t already, to serve its citizens. Although usernames and passwords are easy to deploy […] The post White Paper: FIDO for e-Government Services appeared first on FIDO Alliance.

The global COVID-19 pandemic closed offices and forced governments to rapidly move services online, if they weren’t already, to serve its citizens. Although usernames and passwords are easy to deploy and easy for citizens to use, they leave systems and users vulnerable to cyberattacks. They are especially vulnerable to phishing attacks designed to steal login credentials and compromise legacy multi-factor authentication (MFA) tools like those using one-time passwords (OTP) and push notifications. With phishing attacks on the rise, it is imperative for governments to support “phishing-resistant” MFA technology that is also accessible, efficient, and cost-effective.

Enterprises and governments around the globe are turning to modern online authentication solutions featuring FIDO specifications based on public key cryptography. Governments and industries have embraced FIDO as the preferred way to deliver high-assurance MFA to consumers. Notably, the Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA), a component of the U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS), refers to FIDO security keys as the gold standard of MFA1. 

Several governments globally have deployed and/or supported FIDO authentication for citizens to securely conduct government transactions, including making tax payments and applying for and accessing government benefits. Governments leveraging FIDO authentication solutions have realized reduced operational costs and increased consumer satisfaction.

This white paper provides guidance for policymakers and department/agency heads seeking to learn about FIDO authentication to support or deploy FIDO for e-government services.

The post White Paper: FIDO for e-Government Services appeared first on FIDO Alliance.

22:55 • 18 hours ago

bitnation

SEC Charges Sam Bankman-Fried for Defrauding US Customers

The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has reportedly filed charges against the recently arrested founder of the bankrupt exchange, FTX, Sam Bankman-Fried. The watchdog accused Bankman-Fried of violating the anti-fraud provisions of the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. The SEC claimed SBF ran nothing less than a […]
The SEC accused Bankman-Fried of diverting customer funds for personal use. The 30-year-old was said to have given investors the false impression that FTX was safe and had appropriate risk management systems. Bankman-Fried was arrested in the Bahamas recently after being charged in the United States.

The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has reportedly filed charges against the recently arrested founder of the bankrupt exchange, FTX, Sam Bankman-Fried. The watchdog accused Bankman-Fried of violating the anti-fraud provisions of the Securities Act of 1933 and the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.

The SEC claimed SBF ran nothing less than a “brazen,” years-long fraud from the start of FTX, which enabled him to mismanage and divert billions of users’ funds for personal use. Legal filings released on Tuesday said Bankman-Fried used customer funds to bail out his trading company, Alameda Research, which was supposed to operate separately from FTX. The 30-year-old is also said to have misused funds to push his political ambitions with heavy donations.

According to the civil lawsuit the agency filed in the Southern District of New York, Bankman-Fried generated more than $1.8 billion from investors who purchased equity stakes in the exchange under the impression that FTX had effective control and proactive risk management.

Customers allegedly “believed his lies” and thought the platform was secure, and trusted the exchange with billions of dollars. The filing claimed SBF “spent lavishly on office space and condominiums in The Bahamas, and sank billions of dollars of customer funds into speculative venture investments.”

SEC Chair Gary Gensler said in a statement,

We allege that Sam Bankman-Fried built a house of cards on a foundation of deception while telling investors that it was one of the safest buildings in crypto.

The SEC filed the lawsuit a day after Bankman-Fried was arrested in the Bahamas by law enforcement after being informed that a criminal indictment had been brought against him in a New York court. Bankman-Fried previously claimed he did not knowingly commit fraud. However, regulators believe that had been the plan from the start.

SBF was accused of misleading investors with lies regarding the relationship between FTX and Alameda Research. The FTX founder reportedly claimed, “Alameda was just another platform customer with no special privileges.” But the complaint said Alameda was illegally granted special status with lines of credit and a waiver from the FTX’ liquidation protocols, enabling it access to users’ funds.

Bankman-Fried’s arrest could give regulators increased control over the crypto space.

Bitcoin is Back Above $17k, Altcoins Turn Green, BNB Crashes: Market Report

The crypto market saw a slight upward movement on Tuesday as the crypto coin with the biggest market share, Bitcoin (BTC), was seen above $17k price level once again. The leading cryptocurrency has retested $16k price level as support multiple times and continues its attempts to break above $20k in the near future. Additionally, investors […]
Bitcoin (BTC) has once again reclaimed price action above $17k, while Ether (ETH) is very close to breaking above $1,300. The worst performing tokens are Trust Wallet Token (TWT), Neutrino USD (USN), ApeCoin (APE), and Chain (XCN). The best performing cryptocurrencies are Toncoin (TON), GMX (GMX), Compound (COMP), and Lido DAO (LIDO). The total crypto market liquidation in the last 24 hours amounts to $48.09 million of which BTC makes up around $15.70 million.

The crypto market saw a slight upward movement on Tuesday as the crypto coin with the biggest market share, Bitcoin (BTC), was seen above $17k price level once again. The leading cryptocurrency has retested $16k price level as support multiple times and continues its attempts to break above $20k in the near future. Additionally, investors are still uncertain regarding the short-term future price movements.

Interestingly, Bitcoin reclaiming the $17k price level comes as relief as $16k has successfully held. Overall, the market capitalization of the entire industry has also moved up a bit. On the whole, Tuesday has treated investors fairly and now, BTC holders are wondering if the leading crypto coin can pick up pace as a new year is coming soon.

As of 6:47 am ET Monday, the price of 1 Bitcoin (BTC) stands at $17,444, up 2.66% in the last 24 hours while in the last seven days, the price has jumped by around 2.75%. If a similar cycle continues this week, holders might see the leading cryptocurrency make a move towards the $20k price level which was lost when former multi-billion dollar crypto exchange FTX collapsed and filed for bankruptcy.

The market dominance of Bitcoin stands at 39.22% while the trading of the cryptocurrency has jumped by 15.63% in the last 24 hours which means that buyers are gradually gaining dominance over the sellers in the market. However, BTC is still significantly low (about 75%) from its all-time high of $69k noted in November 2021.

According to the chart below from PricePredictions, Bitcoin is making a rising trendline on the one hour timeframe which suggests that BTC is picking up pace and volatility might rise further. Investors can expect the cryptocurrency to retain $17k if situation remains the same.

Source: PricePredictions

The market sentiment is currently bullish on a shorter timeframe.

Source: PricePredictions

The indicators are bullish on almost every time frame except the daily time frame. All the major indicators used in the crypto space can be seen below and to summarize, the 5 mintue, 15 minute, 30 minute, one hour, two hour and four hour time frames are bullish while the 24 hour frame is bearish.

Source: PricePredictions

Moreover, the market sentiment reads “fear,” confirming that investors are still unsure regarding their investments and the future price action of Bitcoin (BTC) and altcoins.

Furthermore, the market cap of the entire crypto space at the time of publication stands at $856 billion, and this value is up 1.42% in the last 24 hours. Moreover, the number of crypto coins is 22,022, as listed on CoinMarketCap.

It is also crucial to note that the world’s second-biggest cryptocurrency, the Ether (ETH) token, which is the closest competitor to Bitcoin, has performed identically to BTC and is up 2.69% in the last 24 hours and is currently priced at $1,287. The trading volume of the crypto coin has surged by 27.96%, while the market dominance stands at 18.41%.

According to the data from Coinglass, the total crypto market liquidation in the last 24 hours amounted to $48.09 million, of which, Bitcoin made up $15.70 million and Ether made up $12.02 million.

Excluding Bitcoin and Ether, the other top 10 cryptocurrencies in the industry are Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Dogecoin (DOGE), Cardano (ADA), and Polygon (MATIC).

The other top 10 cryptocurrencies show bullish movements except BNB, which is down 5.23% to $268.66. Additionally, XRP is up 3.16% to $0.3865; DOGE is up 0.80% to $0.08988; ADA is up 0.74% to $0.3084; and MATIC is up 1.32% to $0.901.

On the other hand, the worst performing tokens in the last 24 hours among the top 100, excluding the top 10, are Trust Wallet Token (TWT), Neutrino USD (USN), ApeCoin (APE), and Chain (XCN).

Interestingly, TWT was down 19.27% to $2.12; USN was down 12.50% to $0.7139; APE was down 6.74% to $4.11; and XCN was down 4.30% to $0.03381.

Finally, the best performers in the top 100, not considering the top 10 cryptocurrencies are Toncoin (TON), GMX (GMX), Lido DAO (LIDO), and Compound (COMP).

TON was up 9.37% to $2.29; GMX was up 3.41% to $59.03; COMP was up 4.34% to $39.22; and LIDO was up 5.56% to $1.05.

12:28 • a day ago

FSB Eyes Rapid Rollout of Crypto Regulations in 2023

The crypto industry is currently in a sticky mess following the collapse of former multi-billion dollar crypto exchange, FTX. The implosion of the exchange was the last straw for regulators around the globe to converge and target the regulation of these digital assets for investors’ protection. As a consequence, the Financial Stability Board (FSB) has […]
Outgoing secretary-general of Financial Stability Board (FSB) stated that the body plans to roll out crypto regulations swiftly in 2023. Dietrich Domanski said that the FSB will set a timeline for regulators to discuss and implement its first recommendations on global crypto regulation. The body will also outline several areas of the crypto space where policymakers could benefit from “more clarity” before making rules. The crypto regulation strategy “shows clearly what the way forward (for crypto) regulation looks like,” said Domanski.

The crypto industry is currently in a sticky mess following the collapse of former multi-billion dollar crypto exchange, FTX. The implosion of the exchange was the last straw for regulators around the globe to converge and target the regulation of these digital assets for investors’ protection. As a consequence, the Financial Stability Board (FSB) has confirmed that it is preparing for a rapid rollout of crypto regulations in 2023.

According to a report from Financial Times, the outgoing secretary-general Financial Stability Board (FSB), an international body that monitors and makes recommendations about the global financial system, Dietrich Domanski, revealed the global body’s intentions regarding crypto assets. Interestingly, in November, the FSB appointed John W Schindler as its new secretary-general who has yet to talk about these incoming regulations.

A criticism of regulators around the globe might’ve been the reason for this rapid development of crypto regulations from the FSB. The report further adds that the international will be working on the regulations and roll them out switfly in 2023. Interestingly, there has been a regulatory vacuum in the crypto space which has allowed crypto firms like FTX to achieve sky-high valuations without a proper business in place.

“One objective of this work plan is precisely to counter a perception that all this (work on cryptocurrency) is disperse and slow and is not focused on a single common goal,” Dietrich Domanski revealed in a statement a day before his five year tenure at FSB ends.

In the coming months, the FSB will set a timeline for global regulators to discuss and implement its first recommendations on global crypto regulation and the financial body will also outline several areas of the crypto space where policymakers could benefit from “more clarity” before making rules. These areas will be inspired by the recent collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto exchange FTX and Do Kwon’s stablecoin project, Terra.

Furthermore, as per the outgoing secretary-general, the members of the FSB had a “strong agreement” about the crypto regulation strategy which “shows clearly what the way forward (for crypto) regulation looks like,” more than five years after the FSB began evaluating the sector’s risks.

“Many crypto market participants argue that authorities are hostile to innovation. I would say so far, authorities have been fairly accommodating . . . recent events have reinforced the recognition that it is indeed urgent to address risks,” he said.

Domanski said that the objective of the new crypto guidelines is to regulate the space in such a way that blockchain firms “would be held to the same standards as banks . . . if they provide the same service that banks provide.”

In the light of crypto regulation in the US, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) recently issued guidelines asking firms to reveal their exposure to cryptocurrencies and also if they have existing relationships with crypto companies.

BNB Token Plunges 5% on Binance Investigation Rumors

Crypto exchange Binance's BNB token dropped around 5% and as of 12:40 am ET, the price 1 BNB token stands at $267.65.
Crypto exchange Binance’s BNB token dropped around 5% and as of 12:40 am ET, the price 1 BNB token stands at $267.65. The price crash is a result of a Reuters report stating that half of DoJ prosecutors want to file criminal charges against the exchange. Additionally, Binance has paused USDC withdrawals via on the Ethereum Network and the BEP2 Network. Binance has refuted the report while adding that it has smooth relations with regulators.

Binance, the world’s biggest crypto exchange, seems to have become the center of attraction for the entire crypto community, and even the slightest of rumors seem to have grave repercussions. A report was circulated regarding a criminal investigation of the leading crypto exchange which has led to a strong crash in the price of the exchange’s native token, BNB.

Currently the world’s forth biggest cryptocurrency, the BNB token is used for multiple purposes in the Binance ecosystem and differs from other tokens like FTX’s FTT token, which had no underlying value. Interestingly, as of 12:40 am ET, the price of 1 BNB token stands at $267.65, and it is down by almost 5% in the last 24 hours due to the panic and FUD created by a report from Reuters that the US Department of Justice (DoJ) is investigating the leading exchange for money laundering activities.
